message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
